verses.ar_he: דְרַכִּיכָא בָךְ וְדִמְפַנְקָא דִי לָא נַסִיאַת פַּרְסַת רַגְלַהּ לַאֲחָתָא עַל אַרְעָא מִמְפַנְקוּ וּמֵרַכִּיכוּ תַּבְאֵשׁ עֵינַהּ בִּגְבַר קְיָמַהּ וּבִבְרַהּ וּבִבְרַתַּהּ
verses.ar_en: The soft female among you and the indulged one the sole of whose foot never experienced standing [putting her foot] on the ground out of indulgence and out of softness; her eye will begrudge the husband of her bosom [covenant], and her son and daughter.

verses.ar_he: וּבִזְעֵר בְּנָהָא דְיִפְּקוּן מִנַהּ וּבִבְנָהָא דִי תְלִיד אֲרֵי תֵיכְלִנוּן בַּחֲסֵירוּת כֹּלָא בְּסִתְרָא בִּצְיָרָא וּבְעַקְתָא דִי יָעֵק לָךְ סָנְאָךְ בְּקִרְוָיךְ
verses.ar_en: And her infant [little children] who emerges from between her legs [from her], and her children whom she bears, when she eats them for lack of everything, secretly; in siege and in distress that your enemy will distress you in your cities.

verses.ar_he: אִם לָא תִטַר לְּמֶעְבַּד יָת כָּל פִּתְגָמֵי אוֹרַיְתָא הָדָא דִכְתִיבִין בְּסִפְרָא הָדֵין לְמִדְחַל יָת שְׁמָא יַקִירָא וּדְחִילָא הָדֵין יָת יְיָ אֱלָהָךְ
verses.ar_en: If you will not guard to perform all the statements of this Torah that are written in this book to fear the respected and awesome Name, of Adonoy, your God.

verses.ar_he: וְיַפְרַשׁ יְיָ יָת מְחָתָךְ וְיָת מָחַת בְּנָיךְ מָחָן רַבְרְבָן וּמְהֵימְנָן וּמַכְתְּשִׁין בִּישִׁין וּמְהֵימְנִין
verses.ar_en: Adonoy will strike you with prodigous blows and blows on your offspring, blows, great and dependable and illnesses harmful and dependable.

verses.ar_he: וְיָתֵב בָּךְ יָת כָּל מַכְתְּשֵׁי מִצְרַיִם דִי דְחֶלְתָּא מִקֳדָמֵיהוֹן וְיִדְבְּקוּן בָּךְ
verses.ar_en: He will bring back for you all the Egyptian diseases which you dreaded and they will cling to you.

verses.ar_he: אַף כָּל מְרַע וְכָל מָחָא דִי לָא כְתִיבִין בְּסִפְרָא דְאוֹרַיְתָא הָדָא יַיְתִנוּן יְיָ עֲלָךְ עַד דְיִשְׁתֵּצָךְ
verses.ar_en: Also every illness and every plague that is not written in the book of this Torah, will Adonoy raise up against you until you are destroyed.

verses.ar_he: וְתִשְׁתַּאֲרוּן בְּעַם זְעֵר חֳלָף דִי הֲוֵיתוּן כְּכוֹכְבֵי שְׁמַיָא לְמִסְגֵי אֲרֵי לָא קַבֶּלְתָּא לְמֵימְרָא דַיְיָ אֱלָהָךְ
verses.ar_en: You will remain numerically few [a small nation] instead of your having been like the stars in the sky, multitudinous; for you have not obeyed [accepted the word of] Adonoy, your God.

verses.ar_he: וִיהֵי כְּמָא דְחַדֵי יְיָ עֲלֵיכוֹן לְאוֹטָבָא יָתְכוֹן וּלְאַסְגָאָה יָתְכוֹן כֵּן יֶחֱדֵי יְיָ עֲלֵיכוֹן לְאוֹבָדָא יָתְכוֹן וּלְשֵׁצָאָה יָתְכוֹן וְתִטַלְטְלוּן מֵעַל אַרְעָא דְאַתְּ עָלֵל לְתַמָן לְמֵירְתַהּ
verses.ar_en: It will happen that as Adonoy rejoiced over you to benefit you and to multiply you, so will Adonoy bring joy to others over you to remove you and to destroy you; and you will be uprooted [carried away] from upon the land that you are coming there to inherit.

verses.ar_he: וִיבַדְרִנָךְ יְיָ בְּכָל עַמְמַיָא מִסְיָפֵי אַרְעָא וְעַד סְיָפֵי אַרְעָא וְתִפְלַח תַּמָן לְעַמְמַיָא פָּלְחֵי טַעֲוָתָא דִי לָא יְדַעְתְּ אַתְּ וַאֲבָהָתָךְ אָעָא וְאַבְנָא
verses.ar_en: Adonoy will disperse you among all the peoples from the end of the earth to the end of the earth; and you shall serve there [nations who serve] other gods [idols] which neither you nor your ancestors knew, wood and stone.

verses.ar_he: וּבְעַמְמַיָא הָאִנוּן לָא תְנוּחַ וְלָא יְהֵי מְנָח לְפַרְסַת רַגְלָךְ וְיִתֵּן יְיָ לָךְ תַּמָן לֵב דָחֵל וְחַשְׁכַת עַיְנִין וּמַפְּחַן נְפָשׁ
verses.ar_en: And among those nations you will not be tranquil and there will be no rest for the sole of your foot; and Adonoy will give you there a fearful heart and pining eyes and disillusioned spirit.

verses.ar_he: וִיהוֹן חַיָיךְ תְּלָן לָךְ מִקָבֵל וּתְהֵי תָוֵה לֵילְיָא וִימָמָא וְלָא תְהֵימִין בְּחַיָיךְ
verses.ar_en: Your life will dangle before you, and you will be in fear [afraid] night and day, and will have no faith in your living.

verses.ar_he: בְּצַפְרָא תֵימַר מָן יִתֵּן רַמְשָׁא וּבְרַמְשָׁא תֵימַר מָן יִתֵּן צַפְרָא מִתַּוְהוּת לִבָּךְ דִי תְהֵי תָוֵה וּמֵחֵזוּ עֵינָיךְ דִי תְהֵי חָזֵי
verses.ar_en: In the morning you will say, ‘‘Would that it were evening,’’ and in the evening you will say, ‘‘Would that it were morning,’’ from the fear [fright] in your heart that you will fear [be afraid] and from the sights of your eyes that you will see.

verses.ar_he: וְיָתֵיבִנָךְ יְיָ מִצְרַיִם בִּסְפִינָן בְּאָרְחָא דִי אֲמָרִית לָךְ לָא תוֹסֵף עוֹד לְמֶחְזְיַהּ וְתִזְדַבְּנוּן תַּמָן לְבַעֲלֵי דְבָבָךְ לְעַבְדִין וּלְאַמְהָן וְלֵית דְקָנֵהּ
verses.ar_en: Adonoy will send you back to Egypt on ships, along the route that I told you, ‘‘You are not to see it again,’’ and there you will attempt to sell yourselves [be sold] to your enemies as slaves and as maidservants but no one will buy.

verses.ar_he: אִלֵין פִּתְגָמֵי קְיָמָא דִי פַקִיד יְיָ יָת מֹשֶׁה לְמִגְזַר עִם בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל בְּאַרְעָא דְמוֹאָב בַּר מִקְיָמָא דִי גְזַר עִמְהוֹן בְּחֹרֵב
verses.ar_en: These are the statements of the covenant that Adonoy commanded Moshe to ratify with Bnei Yisroel in the land of Moav, beside the covenant that he had made with them at Choreiv.

verses.ar_he: וּקְרָא מֹשֶׁה לְכָל יִשְׂרָאֵל וַאֲמַר לְהוֹן אַתּוּן חֲזֵיתוּן יָת כָּל דִי עֲבַד יְיָ לְעֵינֵיכוֹן בְּאַרְעָא דְמִצְרַיִם לְפַרְעֹה וּלְכָל עַבְדוֹהִי וּלְכָל אַרְעֵהּ
verses.ar_en: Moshe called to all of Yisroel and said to them, ‘‘You have seen everything that Adonoy did as you watched, in the land of Egypt, to Pharoah and to all his attendants and to his entire land.

verses.ar_he: נִסִין רַבְרְבִין דִי חֲזָאָה עֵינָךְ אָתַיָא וּמוֹפְתַיָא רַבְרְבַיָא הָאִנוּן
verses.ar_en: The great miracles that you witnessed, those great signs and wonders.

verses.ar_he: וְלָא יְהַב יְיָ לְכוֹן לִבָּא לְמִדַע וְעַיְנִין לְמֶחֱזֵי וְאֻדְנִין לְמִשְׁמַע עַד יוֹמָא הָדֵין
verses.ar_en: Yet Adonoy did not grant you a knowledgeable mind and eyes to see, and ears to hear until this day.

verses.ar_he: וְדַבָּרִית יָתְכוֹן אַרְבְּעִין שְׁנִין בְּמַדְבְּרָא לָא בְלִיאַת כְּסוּתְכוֹן מִנְכוֹן וּמְסָנָךְ לָא עַדוֹ מֵעַל רַגְלָךְ
verses.ar_en: I have led you forty years in the wilderness, your garments have not worn out on you and your shoes have not worn out on your feet.

verses.ar_he: לַחְמָא לָא אֲכַלְתּוּן וַחֲמַר חֲדַת וְעַתִּיק לָא שְׁתֵיתוּן בְּדִיל דְתִדְעוּן אֲרֵי אֲנָא יְיָ אֶלָהֲכוֹן
verses.ar_en: Bread have you not eaten, neither fresh nor aged wine have you drunk, in order that you know that I, Adonoy, am your God.

verses.ar_he: וַאֲתֵתוּן לְאַתְרָא הָדֵין וּנְפַק סִיחוֹן מַ לְכָּא דְחֶשְׁבּוֹן וְעוֹג מַ לְכָּא דְמַתְנָן לָקֳדָמוּתָנָא לַאֲגָחָא קְרָבָא וּמְחוֹנוּן
verses.ar_en: Then when you came to this place, Sichon, king of Cheshbon, came out—and Og, king of Boshon [Masnon]—toward us to wage war and we smote them.

verses.ar_he: וּנְסִבְנָא יָת אַרְעֲהוֹן וִיהָבִנַהּ לְאַחֲסָנָא לְשִׁבְטָּא דִרְאוּבֵן וּלְשִׁבְטָא דְגָד וּלְפַלְגוּת שִׁבְטָא דִמְנַשֶׁה
verses.ar_en: And we took the their land and gave it as territory to the [tribe of the] Reuvenites and to the [tribe of the] Gaddites, and to half the tribe of the Menashians.

verses.ar_he: וְתִטְרוּן יָת פִּתְגָמֵי קְיָמָא הָדָא וְתַעְבְּדוּן יָתְהוֹן בְּדִיל דְתִצְלְחוּן יָת כָּל דִי תַּעְבְּדוּן
verses.ar_en: You are to guard the tenets of this covenant and fulfill them, in order that you succeed in everything that you do.’’

verses.ar_he: אַתּוּן קָיְמִין יוֹמָא דֵין כֻּלְכוֹן קֳדָם יְיָ אֱלָהֲכוֹן רֵישֵׁיכוֹן שִׁבְטֵיכוֹן סָבֵיכוֹן וְסָרְכֵיכוֹן כָּל אֱנַשׁ יִשְׂרָאֵל
verses.ar_en: ‘‘You stand, this day all of you before Adonoy, your God; your tribal chieftains, your elders and your law officers, every man of Yisroel.

verses.ar_he: טַפְלְכוֹן נְשֵׁיכוֹן וְגִיוֹרָךְ דִי בְּגוֹ מַשְׁרִיתָךְ מִלָקֵטּ אָעָיךְ עַד מְלֵי מַיָיךְ
verses.ar_en: Your young, your wives, and your convert who is within your camps; from your wood cutters to the water drawers.

verses.ar_he: לְאָעָלוּתָךְ בִּקְיָמָא דַיְיָ אֱלָהָךְ וּבְמוֹמָתֵהּ דִי יְיָ אֱלָהָךְ גְזַר עִמָךְ יוֹמָא דֵין
verses.ar_en: For your passage into the covenant of Adonoy, your God, and His oath-curse, that Adonoy, your God, is making with you today.

verses.ar_he: בְּדִיל לַאֲקָמָא יָתָךְ יוֹמָא דֵין קֳדָמוֹהִי לְעַמָא וְהוּא יְהֵי לָךְ לֶאֶלָהּ כְּמָא דִי מַלִיל לָךְ וּכְמָא דִי קַיִים לַאֲבָהָתָךְ לְאַבְרָהָם לְיִצְחָק וּלְיַעֲקֹב
verses.ar_en: In order to sustain you today [before Him] as His people, and He will be for you a God as He promished you and as He promised your forefathers Avrohom, Yitzchok, and Yaakov.

verses.ar_he: וְלָא עִמְכוֹן בִּלְחוֹדֵיכוֹן אֲנָא גְזַר יָת קְיָמָא הָדָא וְיָת מוֹמָתָא הָדָא
verses.ar_en: And not with you alone am I making this covenant and this oath-curse.

verses.ar_he: אֲרֵי יָת מָן דְאִיתוֹהִי הָכָא עִמָנָא קָאֵם יוֹמָא דֵין קֳדָם יְיָ אֱלָהָנָא וְיָת מָן דְלֵיתוֹהִי הָכָא עִמָנָא יוֹמָא דֵין
verses.ar_en: But with whoever is here with us standing today in the presence of Adonoy, our God, and with those who are not here with us today.

verses.ar_he: אֲרֵי אַתּוּן יְדַעְתּוּן יָת דִיתֵבְנָא בְּאַרְעָא דְמִצְרָיִם וְיָת דִי עֲבַרְנָא בְּגוֹ עַמְמַיָא דִי עֲבַרְתּוּן
verses.ar_en: For you are aware how we lived in the land of Egypt, and how we passed through the nations whom you passed through.

verses.ar_he: וַחֲזֵיתוּן יָת שִׁקוּצֵיהוֹן וְיָת טַעֲוָתְהוֹן אָעָא וְאַבְנָא כַּסְפָּא וְדַהֲבָא דִי עִמְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: Where you observed their abominations and their loathsomeness [idols], wood and stone, silver and gold, that they owned.

verses.ar_he: דִילְמָא אִית בְּכוֹן גְבַר אוֹ אִתְּתָא אוֹ זַרְעִית אוֹ שִׁבְטָא דִי לִבֵּהּ פָּנֵי יוֹמָא דֵין מִדַחַלְתָּא דַייָ אֱלָהָנָא לִמְהַךְ לְמִפְלַח יָת טַעֲוַת עַמְמַיָא הָאִנוּן דִילְמָא אִית בְּכוֹן גְבַר מְהַרְהַר חֶטְאִין אוֹ זָדוֹן
verses.ar_en: Perhaps there is among you a man or a woman or a family [offspring] or a tribe whose thoughts stray today from [being] with [the fear of] Adonoy, our God, to go serve the gods [idols] of those nations; lest there is within you a root producing gall and bitter fruit [a man who imagines sin or evil].

verses.ar_he: וִיהֵי בְּמִשְׁמְעֵהּ יָת פִּתְגָמֵי מוֹמָתָא הָדָא וִיחַשַׁב בְּלִבֵּהּ לְמֵימַר שְׁלָמָא יְהֵי לִי אֲרֵי בְּהַרְהוֹר לִבִּי אֲנָא אָזֵל בְּדִיל לְאוֹסָפָא לֵהּ חֶטְאֵי שָׁלוּתָא עַל זְדָנוּתָא
verses.ar_en: When he hears the statements of this oath-curse, he will imagine self-blessings [think to himself], saying, ‘‘Peace will be my lot when I shall follow what my thoughts envision,’’ so that the unintentional may be added to the sinful [I will add unintentional sins to the intentional].

verses.ar_he: לָא יֵיבֵי יְיָ לְמִשְׁבַּק לֵהּ אֲרֵי בְּכֵן יִתְקֵף רָגְזָא דַיְיָ וְחֶמְתֵהּ בְּגַבְרָא הַהוּא וְיִדְבְּקוּן בֵּהּ כָּל לְוָטַּיָא דִכְתִיבִין בְּסִפְרָא הָדֵין וְיִמְחֵי יְיָ יָת שְׁמֵהּ מִתְּחוֹת שְׁמַיָא
verses.ar_en: Adonoy will be unwilling to forgive him, because then Adonoy’s nostrils will fume [anger will be aroused] and His vengeful fury will enflame against [cleave to] that man, and there will cling to him the entire oath-curse written in this book; and Adonoy will eliminate his name from beneath the sky.

verses.ar_he: וְיַפְרְשִׁנֵהּ יְיָ לְבִישָׁא מִכֹּל שִׁבְטַיָא דְיִשְׂרָאֵל כְּכֹל לְוָטֵי קְיָמָא דִכְתִיבִין בְּסִפְרָא דְאוֹרַיְתָא הָדֵין
verses.ar_en: And Adonoy will seperate him for harm from all the tribes of Yisroel, in accord with all the oath-curses of the covenant inscribed in this Torah scroll.

verses.ar_he: וְיֵימַר דָרָא בַתְרָאָה בְּנֵיכוֹן דִי יְקוּמוּן מִבַּתְרֵיכוֹן וּבַר עַמְמִין דִי יֵיתֵי מֵאַרְעָא רְחִיקָא וְיֶחֱזוּן יָת מְחָתָא דְאַרְעָא הַהִיא וְיָת מַרְעָהָא דִי אַמְרַע יְיָ בַּהּ
verses.ar_en: The latter generation will say—your children who will arise after you and the stranger [foreign alien] who will come from a distant land; and they will see the plagues of that land and its illnesses that Adonoy has harmed it with.

verses.ar_he: גָפְרֵתָא וּמִלְחָא יְקִידַת כָּל אַרְעַהּ לָא תִזְרַע וְלָא תַצְמַח וְלָא יִסַק בַּהּ כָּל עֶסְבָּא כְּמַהְפֶּכְתָּא דִסְדֹם וַעֲמֹרָה אַדְמָה וּצְבוֹיִם דִי הֲפַךְ יְיָ בְּרָגְזֵהּ וּבְחֶמְתֵהּ
verses.ar_en: Sulfur and salt, all its land, will be burnt, it will not be seeded, and it will not sprout, and no grass will grow there; like the overturning of Sodom and Amoroh, Admoh and Tzevoyim, which Adonoy overturned in His anger and His wrath.

verses.ar_he: וְיֵימְרוּן כָּל עַמְמַיָא עַל מֶה עֲבַד יְיָ כְּדֵין לְאַרְעָא הָדָא מָא תְקוֹף רָגְזָא רַבָּא הָדֵין
verses.ar_en: And all the nations will say, ‘‘For what did Adonoy do so to this land? Why the vigor of this great [aroused] anger?’’

verses.ar_he: וְיֵימְרוּן עַל דִשְׁבָקוּ יָת קְיָמָא דַיְיָ אֱלָהָא דַאֲבָהָתְהוֹן דִי גְזַר עִמְהוֹן בְּאַפָּקוּתֵהּ יָתְהוֹן מֵאַרְעָא דְמִצְרָיִם
verses.ar_en: And they will reply, ‘‘Because they forsook the covenant of Adonoy, the God of their forefathers, which He made with them when He took them out of the land of Egypt.

verses.ar_he: וַאֲזָלוּ וּפְלָחוּ לְטַעֲוַת עַמְמַיָא וּסְגִידוּ לְהוֹן דַחֲלָן דִי לָא יְדָעֻנוּן וְלָא אוֹטִיבָא לְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: And they went and served other gods and prostrated themselves to them; gods unknown to them and [which] He had not apportioned to them.

verses.ar_he: וּתְקֵף רָגְזָא דַיְיָ בְּאַרְעָא הַהִיא לְאַיְתָאָה עֲלַהּ יָת כָּל לְוָטַיָא דִכְתִיבִין בְּסִפְרָא הָדֵין
verses.ar_en: And Adonoy became furious with that land, [causing Him] to bring on it the entire curse written in this book.

verses.ar_he: וְטַּלְטְּלִנוּן יְיָ מֵעַל אַרְעֲהוֹן בִּרְגַז וּבְחֵמְתָא וּבִתְקוֹף רְגַז וְאַגְלִנוּן לְאַרְעָא אָחֳרִי כְּיוֹמָא הָדֵין
verses.ar_en: And Adonoy forced them away from their land with anger and wrath and great fury [aroused anger]; and He cast [exile] them into another land like this day.

verses.ar_he: דְמִטַמְרָן קֳדָם יְיָ אֱלָהָנָא וּדְמִגַלְיָן לָנָא וְלִבְנָנָא עַד עֳלָם לְמֶעְבַּד יָת כָּל פִּתְגָמֵי אוֹרַיְתָא הָדָא
verses.ar_en: The hidden [matters] are Adonoy’s, our God’s, and the revealed [matters] are ours and our children’s forever, to perform all the statements of this Torah.

verses.ar_he: וִיהֵי אֲרֵי יֵיתוּן עֲלָךְ כָּל פִּתְגָמַיָא הָאִלֵין בִּרְכָן וּלְוָטִין דִי יְהָבִית קֳדָמָךְ וּתְתוּב לְלִבָּךְ בְּכָל עַמְמַיָא דִי אַגְלָךְ יְיָ אֱלָהָךְ לְתַמָן
verses.ar_en: When it happens that there come upon you all these statements, the blessing and the curse that I have set before you; and you will restore to your perception amid all the nations where Adonoy, your God, has exiled you.

verses.ar_he: וּתְתוּב לְדַחַלְתָּא דַיְיָ אֱלָהָךְ וּתְקַבֵּל לְמֵימְרֵהּ כְּכֹל דִי אֲנָא מְפַקְדָךְ יוֹמָא דֵין אַתְּ וּבְנָיךְ בְּכָל לִבָּךְ וּבְכָל נַפְשָׁךְ
verses.ar_en: You will return to [the fear of] Adonoy, your God, and obey Him [accept His word] exactly as I am commanding you today, you and your sons, wholeheartedly and with your whole being.

verses.ar_he: וִיתוּב יְיָ אֱלָהָךְ יָת שְׁבִי גַלְוָתָךְ וִירַחַם עֲלָךְ וִיתוּב וְיִכְנְשִׁנָךְ מִכָּל עַמְמַיָא דִי בַדְרָךְ יְיָ אֱלָהָךְ לְתַמָן
verses.ar_en: Adonoy, your God, will bring back your returnees [of your exile] and will be merciful toward you; and He will return and gather you from all the peoples that Adonoy, your God, has dispersed you there.

verses.ar_he: אִם יְהֵי גַלְוָתָךְ בִּסְיָפֵי שְׁמַיָא מִתַּמָן יִכְנְשִׁנָךְ יְיָ אֱלָהָךְ וּמִתַּמָן יְקָרְבִנָךְ
verses.ar_en: If your exiled one will be at the edge of the heavens, from there will Adonoy, your God, gather you and from there will He take you [bring you near].

verses.ar_he: וְיָעֵלִנָךְ יְיָ אֱלָהָךְ לְאַרְעָא דִירִיתוּ אֲבָהָתָךְ וְתֵרְתַהּ וְיוֹטֶב לָךְ וְיַסְגִנָךְ מֵאֲבְהָתָךְ
verses.ar_en: And Adonoy, your God, will bring you to the land that your forefathers inherited and you will inherit it; and He will benefit you and multiply you more than your forefathers.

verses.ar_he: וְיֶעְדֵי יְיָ אֱלָהָךְ יָת טַפְשׁוּת לִבָּךְ וְיָת טַּפְשׁוּת לִבָּא דִבְנָיךְ לְמִרְחַם יָת יְיָ אֱלָהָךְ בְּכָל לִבָּךְ וּבְכָל נַפְשָׁךְ בְּדִיל חַיָיךְ
verses.ar_en: And Adonoy, your God, will circumcise [remove the foolishness from] your heart and the heart of your descendants, to love Adonoy, your God, wholeheartedly and with all your being in order that you live.

verses.ar_he: וְיִתֵּן יְיָ אֱלָהָךְ יָת כָּל לְוָטַיָא הָאִלֵין עַל בַּעֲלֵי דְבָבָךְ וְעַל סָנְאָךְ דִי רְדָפוּךְ
verses.ar_en: Adonoy, your God, will place all these oath-curses upon your enemies and upon your foes who chased you.

verses.ar_he: וְאַתְּ תְּתוּב וּתְקַבַּל לְמֵימְרָא דַיְיָ וְתַעְבֵּד יָת כָּל פִּקוּדוֹהִי דִי אֲנָא מְפַקְדָךְ יוֹמָא דֵין
verses.ar_en: And you will turn back and obey [accept the word of] Adonoy; and you will perform all His commandments that I am commanding you today.

verses.ar_he: וְיוֹתְרִינָךְ יְיָ אֱלָהָךְ בְּכֹל עוֹבָדֵי יְדָךְ בְּוַלְדָא דִמְעָךְ וּבְוַלְדָא דִבְעִירָךְ וּבְאִבָּא דְאַרְעָךְ לְטָּבָא אֲרֵי יְתוּב יְיָ לְמֶחֱדֵי עֲלָךְ לְטָב כְּמָא דִי חֲדִי עַל אֲבָהָתָךְ
verses.ar_en: Adonoy, your God, will give you surplus in all your endeavors, in the fruit [offspring] of your belly, and in the offspring of your animals, and in the produce [fruit] of your soil—for benefit; for Adonoy will return to rejoice over you for benefit as He rejoiced over your forefathers.

verses.ar_he: אֲרֵי תְקַבַּל בְּמֵימְרָא דַיְיָ אֱלָהָךְ לְמִטַר פִּקוּדוֹהִי וּקְיָמוֹהִי דִכְתִיבִין בְּסִפְרָא דְאוֹרַיְתָא הָדֵין אֲרֵי תְתוּב קֳדָם יְיָ אֱלָהָךְ בְּכָל לִבָּךְ וּבְכָל נַפְשָׁךְ
verses.ar_en: When you obey [accept the word of] Adonoy, your God, to guard His commandments and His statutes, written in this Torah scroll; when you turn back to Adonoy, your God, wholeheartedly and with all your being.

verses.ar_he: אֲרֵי תַּפְקֶדְתָּא הָדָא דִי אֲנָא מְפַקְדָךְ יוֹמָא דֵין לָא מַפְרְשָׁא הִיא מִנָךְ וְלָא רְחִיקָא הִיא
verses.ar_en: For this mitzvah that I am commanding you today; it is not abstruse to you nor is it distant.

verses.ar_he: לָא בִשְׁמַיָא הִיא לְמֵימָר מָן יִסַק לָנָא לִשְׁמַיָא וְיִסְבַהּ לָנָא וְיַשְׁמְעִנָנָא יָתַהּ וְנַעְבְּדִנַהּ
verses.ar_en: It is not in heaven, [for you] to say, ‘‘Who will go up to heaven for us, and acquire it for us, and inform us of it, and we will fulfill it?’’

verses.ar_he: וְלָא מֵעִבְרָא לְיַמָא הִיא לְמֵימַר מָן יֵעִבַר לָנָא לְעִבְרָא דְיַמָא וְיִסְבַהּ לָנָא וְיַשְׁמְעִנָנָא יָתַהּ וְנַעְבְּדִנַהּ
verses.ar_en: Nor is it overseas, [for you] to say, ‘‘Who will travel overseas for us, and acquire it for us, and inform us of it, and we will fulfill it?’’

verses.ar_he: אֲרֵי קָרִיב לָךְ פִּתְגָמָא לַחֲדָא בְּפוּמָךְ וּבְלִבָּךְ לְמֶעְבְּדֵהּ
verses.ar_en: For the matter is extremely close to you; in your mouth and in your mind to fulfill it.

verses.ar_he: חֲזֵי דִיהָבִית קֳדָמָךְ יוֹמָא דֵין יָת חַיֵי וְיָת טַבְתָא וְיָת מוֹתָא וְיָת בִּישָׁא
verses.ar_en: See, I have placed before you today life and good, and death and bad.

verses.ar_he: דִי אֲנָא מְפַקְדָךְ יוֹמָא דֵין לְמִרְחַם יָת יְיָ אֱלָהָךְ לִמְהַךְ בְּאָרְחָן דְתָקְנָן קֳדָמוֹהִי וּלְמִטַר פִּקוּדוֹהִי וּקְיָמוֹהִי וְדִינוֹהִי וְתֵיחֵי וְתִסְגֵי וִיבָרֵכִנָךְ יְיָ אֱלָהָךְ בְּאַרְעָא דִי אַתְּ עָלֵל לְתַמָן לְמֵירְתַהּ
verses.ar_en: For which I command you this day, to love Adonoy, your God, to go in His ways [proper before Him] and to guard His commandments and His statutes and His laws; and you will live and you will flourish, and Adonoy, your God, will bless you in the land that you are coming there to inherit.

verses.ar_he: וְאִם יִפְנֵי לִבָּךְ וְלָא תְקַבֵּל וְתִטְּעֵי וְתִסְגוּד לְטַּעֲוַת עַמְמַיָא וְתִפְלְחִנוּן
verses.ar_en: But if your heart strays and you do not listen [accept], and you are misled, and you prostrate yourself to other gods [idols of the nations] and worship them.

verses.ar_he: חַוֵיתִי לְכוֹן יוֹמָא דֵין אֲרֵי מֵיבַד תֵּיבְדוּן לָא תוֹרְכוּן יוֹמִין עַל אַרְעָא דִי אַתְּ עָבֵר יָת יַרְדְנָא לְמֵעַל לְתַמָן לְמֵירְתַהּ
verses.ar_en: I tell [have shown] you today that you shall certainly perish; you will not remain long on the land that you are crossing the Yardein to come there to inherit.

verses.ar_he: אַסְהֵדִית בְּכוֹן יוֹמָא דֵין יָת שְׁמַיָא וְיָת אַרְעָא חַיֵי וּמוֹתָא יְהָבִית קֳדָמָךְ בִּרְכָן וּלְוָטִין וְתִתִּרְעֵי בְּחַיֵי בְּדִיל דְתֵיחֵי אַתְּ וּבְנָיךְ
verses.ar_en: I invoke, as witnesses against you this day, heaven and earth: Life and death have I placed before you, blessing and curse; you choose life in order that you live, you and your descendants,

verses.ar_he: לְמִרְחַם יָת יְיָ אֱלָהָךְ לְקַבָּלָא לְמֵימְרֵהּ וּלְאִתְקְרָבָא לְדַחַלְתֵּהּ אֲרֵי הוּא חַיָיךְ וְאוֹרָכוּת יוֹמָיךְ לְמִתַּב עַל אַרְעָא דִי קַיִים יְיָ לַאֲבָהָתָךְ לְאַבְרָהָם לְיִצְחָק וּלְיַעֲקֹב לְמִתַּן לְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: To love Adonoy, your God, to obey Him [accept His word] and to cling to [the fear of] Him; for He is your life and your longevity, to live on the soil that Adonoy swore to your forefathers—to Avrohom, to Yitzchok, and to Yaakov—to give them.

verses.ar_he: וַאֲזַל מֹשֶׁה וּמַלִיל יָת פִּתְגָמַיָא הָאִלֵין עִם כָּל יִשְׂרָאֵל
verses.ar_en: Moshe went and he addressed these statements to all of Yisroel.

verses.ar_he: וַאֲמַר לְהוֹן בַּר מְאָה וְעֶשְׂרִין שְׁנִין אֲנָא יוֹמָא דֵין לֵית אֲנָא יָכִיל עוֹד לְמִפַּק וּלְמֵעָל וַיְיָ אֲמַר לִי לָא תֵעִבַר יָת יַרְדְנָא הָדֵין
verses.ar_en: He said to them, ‘‘I am 120 years old today, I cannot any longer go forth and return; for Adonoy has said to me, ‘You will not cross this Yardein.’

verses.ar_he: יְיָ אֱלָהָךְ מֵימְרֵהּ עֲבַר קֳדָמָךְ הוּא יְשֵׁצֵי יָת עַמְמַיָא הָאִלֵין מִקֳדָמָךְ וְתֵירְתִנוּן יְהוֹשֻׁעַ הוּא עֲבַר קֳדָמָךְ כְּמָא דִי מַלִיל יְיָ
verses.ar_en: Adonoy, your God, He [His word] is crossing before you, He will destroy these nations before you and you will inherit them. Yehoshua, he is crossing before you as Adonoy has stated.

verses.ar_he: וְיַעְבֵּד יְיָ לְהוֹן כְּמָא דִי עֲבַד לְסִיחוֹן וּלְעוֹג מַלְכֵי אֱמוֹרָאָה וּלְאַרְעֲהוֹן דִי שֵׁצִי יָתְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: And Adonoy will do to them as He did to Sichon and to Og, kings of the Emorites, and to their land; whom He destroyed.

verses.ar_he: וְיִמְסְרִנוּן יְיָ קֳדָמֵיכוֹן וְתַעְבְּדוּן לְהוֹן כְּכָל תַּפְקֶדְתָּא דִי פַקֵדִית יָתְכוֹן
verses.ar_en: Adonoy will defeat [deliver] them before you, and you will do to them in accord with the mitzvah that I commanded you.

verses.ar_he: תְּקִיפוּ וְאַלִימוּ לָא תִדְחֲלוּן וְלָא תִתָּבְרוּן מִקֳדָמֵיהוֹן אֲרֵי יְיָ אֱלָהָךְ הוּא דִמְדַבַּר קֳדָמָךְ לָא יִשְׁבְּקִנָךְ וְלָא יַרְטֵשִׁנָךְ
verses.ar_en: Be courageous and bold, do not fear and do not quake before them; for Adonoy, your God, it is He Who is going with you, He will not enfeeble you nor will He abandon you.’’

verses.ar_he: וּקְרָא מֹשֶׁה לִיהוֹשֻׁעַ וַאֲמַר לֵהּ לְעֵינֵי כָל יִשְׂרָאֵל תְּקַף וְאַלִים אֲרֵי אַתְּ תֵּעוּל עִם עַמָא הָדֵין לְאַרְעָא דִי קַיִים יְיָ לַאֲבְהָתְהוֹן לְמִתַּן לְהוֹן וְאַתְּ תַּחְסְנִנַהּ יָתְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: Moshe called Yehoshua and said to him as all of Yisroel watched, ‘‘Be courageous and bold, for you shall enter with this people into the land that Adonoy swore to their forefathers to give them, and you will apportion it to them.

verses.ar_he: וַיְיָ הוּא דִמְדַבַּר קֳדָמָךְ מֵימְרֵהּ יְהֵי בְסַעְדָךְ לָא יִשְׁבְּקִנָךְ וְלָא יַרְחֵקִנָךְ לָא תִדְחַל וְלָא תִתְּבַר
verses.ar_en: And Adonoy is the One Who is going ahead of you, He [His word] will be with you [your support], will not enfeeble you and will not abandon [distance] you; do not fear and do not quake.

verses.ar_he: וּכְתַב מֹשֶׁה יָת אוֹרַיְתָא הָדָא וִיהָבַהּ לְכָהֲנַיָא בְּנֵי לְוֵי דְנָטְלִין יָת אֲרוֹן קְיָמָא דַיְיָ וּלְכָל סָבֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל
verses.ar_en: Moshe wrote this Torah and he gave it to the kohanim, descendants of Levi, who carry the ark of Adonoy’s covenant; and to all the elders of Yisroel.

verses.ar_he: וּפַקִיד מֹשֶׁה יָתְהוֹן לְמֵימָר מִסוֹף שְׁבַע שְׁנִין בִּזְמַן שַׁתָּא דִשְׁמִטְתָא בְּחַגָא דְמְטַלַיָא
verses.ar_en: Moshe commanded them, saying: After seven years have ended, on the holy day of the Sh’mittah year, during the Sukkos festival;

verses.ar_he: בְּמֵיתֵי כָל יִשְׂרָאֵל לְאִתְחֲזָאָה קֳדָם יְיָ אֱלָהָךְ בְּאַתְרָא דִי יִתִּרְעֵי תִּקְרֵי יָת אוֹרַיְתָא הָדָא קֳדָם כָּל יִשְׂרָאֵל וְתַשְׁמְעִנוּן
verses.ar_en: When all of Yisroel comes to be seen in the presence of Adonoy, your God, in the place that He chooses, you shall read this Torah facing [before] all of Yisroel for them to hear.

verses.ar_he: כְּנוֹשׁ יָת עַמָא גֻבְרַיָא וּנְשַׁיָא וְטַּפְלָא וְגִיוֹרָךְ דִי בְקִרְוָיךְ בְּדִיל דְיִשְׁמְעוּן וּבְדִיל דְיַלְפוּן (נ''א דְיֵלְפוּן) וְיִדְחֲלוּן מֵקֳדָם יְיָ אֱלָהֲכוֹן וְיִטְרוּן לְמֶעְבַּד יָת כָּל פִּתְגָמֵי אוֹרַיְתָא הָדָא
verses.ar_en: Assemble the people—the men and the women and the infants, and your convert who is in your towns; in order for them to hear and in order for them to learn to fear [before] Adonoy, your God, and they will make sure to fulfill all the statements of this Torah.

verses.ar_he: וּבְנֵיהוֹן דִי לָא יָדְעוּן יִשְׁמְעוּן וְיַלְפוּן (נ''א וְיֵלְפוּן) לְמִדְחַל יָת יְיָ אֱלָהֲכוֹן כֹּל יוֹמַיָא דִי אַתּוּן קְיָמִין עַל אַרְעָא דִי אַתּוּן עָבְרִין יָת יַרְדְנָא תַּמָן לְמֵירְתַהּ
verses.ar_en: And their children who did not understand will hear and will learn to fear Adonoy, your God, all the years that you are living on the land that you are crossing the Yardein there to inherit.

verses.ar_he: וַאֲמַר יְיָ לְמֹשֶׁה הָא קְרִיבוּ יוֹמָיךְ לִמְמַת קְרָא יָת יְהוֹשֻׁעַ וְאִתְעֲתָּדוּ בְּמַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא וֶאֱפַקְדִנֵהּ וַאֲזַל מֹשֶׁה וִיהוֹשֻׁעַ וְאִתְעַתָּדוּ בְּמַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא
verses.ar_en: Adonoy said to Moshe, ‘‘Look! Your time is approaching to die. Call Yehoshua and present yourselves in Ohel Moed and I shall exhort him.’’ Moshe went with Yehoshua and they presented themselves in Ohel Moed.

verses.ar_he: וְאִתְגְלִי יְיָ בְּמַשְׁכְּנָא בְּעַמוּדָא דַעֲנָנָא וְקָם עַמוּדָא דַעֲנָנָא עַל תְּרַע מַשְׁכְּנָא
verses.ar_en: Adonoy revealed Himself in the Ohel in a pillar of cloud; the pillar of cloud remained at the entrance of the Ohel.

verses.ar_he: וַאֲמַר יְיָ לְמֹשֶׁה הָא אַתְּ שָׁכֵב עִם אֲבָהָתָךְ וִיקוּם עַמָא הָדֵין וְיִטְּעֵי בָּתַר טַעֲוַת עַמְמֵי אַרְעָא דִי הוּא עַל תַּמָן בֵּינֵיהוֹן וְיִשְׁבְּקוּן דַחַלְתִּי וְיַשְׁנוּן יָת קְיָמִי דִי גְזָרִית עִמְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: Adonoy said to Moshe, ‘‘You are about to die, and this people will arise and stray after the gods of the stranger [people] [foreign idols] of the land that they are going there among them, and they will forsake [the fear of] Me and break My covenant that I made with them.

verses.ar_he: וְיִתְקוֹף רָגְזִי בְהוֹן בְּיוֹמָא הַהוּא וְאַרְחֵקִנוּן וֶאֱסַלֵק שְׁכִנְתִּי מִנְהוֹן וִיהוֹן לְמִבַּז וִיעָרְעַן יָתְהוֹן בִּישָׁן סַגִיאָן וְעָקָן וְיֵימַר בְּיוֹמָא הַהוּא הֲלָא מִדְלֵית שְׁכִינַת אֱלָהַי בֵּינִי עָרְעוּנִי בִּישַׁיָא הָאִלֵין
verses.ar_en: And I will wax angry at them on that day and I will forsake [distance] them and I shall conceal My face [Shechinah] from them and they will be for consuming [scorned] and many evils and troubles will happen to them; and they will say on that day, ‘‘Look! Because [the Shechinah of] my God is not within me did these evils happen to me.’’

verses.ar_he: וַאֲנָא סַלָקָא אֶסַלֵק שְׁכִנְתִּי מִנְהוֹן בְּיוֹמָא הַהוּא עַל כָּל בִּישָׁא דִי עֲבָדוּ אֲרֵי אִתְפְּנִיוּ לְטַעֲוַת עַמְמַיָא
verses.ar_en: And I will surely conceal My face [remove My Shechinah from them] on that day because of all the wickedness that they did, because they turned to other gods [idols of other nations].

verses.ar_he: וּכְעַן כְּתִיבוּ לְכוֹן יָת תֻּשְׁבַּחְתָּא הָדָא וְאַלְפַהּ יָת בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל שַׁוְיַהּ בְּפוּמְהוֹן בְּדִיל דִתְהֵי קֳדָמַי תֻּשְׁבַּחְתָּא הָדָא לְסָהִיד בִּבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל
verses.ar_en: And now write for yourselves this song [praise] and teach it to Bnei Yisroel to place it in their mouths; in order that this song [praise] will be for [before] Me a witness against Bnei Yisroel.

verses.ar_he: אֲרֵי אָעֵלִנוּן לְאַרְעָא דִי קַיֵמִית לַאֲבָהָתְהוֹן עָבְדָא חֲלַב וּדְבַשׁ וְיֵיכְלוּן וְיִשְׂבְּעוּן וְיִתְפַּנְקוּן וְיִתְפְּנוּן בָּתַר טַּעֲוַת עַמְמַיָא וְיִפְלְחֻנוּן וְיִרְגְזוּן קֳדָמַי וְיַשְׁנוּן יָת קְיָמִי
verses.ar_en: For I will bring them to the land that I swore to their forefathers, flowing milk and honey, and they will eat, and be full, and wax fat; and they will turn to other gods [idols of other nations] and serve them and they will infuriate [before] Me and break My covenant.

verses.ar_he: וִיהֵי אֲרֵי יְעָרְעָן יָתֵהּ בִּישָׁן סַגִיאָן וְעָקָן וְתָתֵב תֻּשְׁבַּחְתָּא הָדָא קֳדָמוֹהִי לְסָהִיד אֲרֵי לָא תִתְנְשֵׁי מִפּוּם בֵּנֵיהוֹן ארֵי גִלֵי קֳדָמַי יָת יִצְרְהוֹן דִי אִנוּן עָבְדִין יוֹמָא דֵין עַד לָא אָעֵלִנוּן לְאַרְעָא דִי קַיֵמִית
verses.ar_en: Should many evils and troubles happen to them, this song [praise] shall [return and] serve [before Me] as testimony before them as witness—for it shall never be forgotten from the lips of their progeny—for I know [it is revealed before Me] their impulse that they are gratifying today prior to My bringing them to the land that I swore.

verses.ar_he: וּכְתַב מֹשֶׁה יָת תּוּשְׁבַּחְתָּא הָדָא בְּיוֹמָא הַהוּא וְאַלֵפִנַהּ לִבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל
verses.ar_en: Moshe wrote this song [praise] on that day, and he taught it to Bnei Yisroel.

verses.ar_he: וּפַקִיד יָת יְהוֹשֻׁעַ בַּר נוּן וַאֲמַר תְּקֵף וְאַלִים אֲרֵי אַתְּ תָּעֵל יָת בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל לְאַרְעָא דִי קַיֵמִית לְהוֹן וּמֵימְרִי יְהֵי בְסַעְדָךְ
verses.ar_en: He commanded Yehoshua, the son of Nun and said, ‘‘Be courageous and bold, for you will bring Bnei Yisroel to the land that I swore to them, and I will be with you.’’

verses.ar_he: וַהֲוָה כַּד שֵׁצֵי מֹשֶׁה לְמִכְתַּב יָת פִּתְגָמֵי אוֹרַיְתָא הָדָא עַל סִפְרָא עַד דִשְׁלִימוּ
verses.ar_en: When Moshe finished writing the statements of this Torah in a book, till they were complete,

verses.ar_he: וּפַקִיד מֹשֶׁה יָת לֵוָאֵי נָטְלֵי אֲרוֹן קְיָמָא דַיְיָ לְמֵימָר
verses.ar_en: Moshe commanded the Levites, bearers of the ark of Adonoy’s covenant, saying:

verses.ar_he: סִיבוּ יָת סִפְרָא דְאוֹרַיְתָא הָדֵין וּתְשַׁוּוּן יָתֵהּ מִסְטַר אֲרוֹן קְיָמָא דַיְיָ אֱלָהֲכוֹן וִיהֵי תַמָן בָּךְ לְסָהִיד
verses.ar_en: ‘‘Take this book of the Torah and place it on the side of the ark of Adonoy, your God’s covenant; and it will be there as witness against you.

verses.ar_he: אֲרֵי אֲנָא יְדַעְנָא יָת סַרְבָנוּתָךְ וְיָת קְדָלָךְ דְקַשְׁיָא הָא בְעַד אֲנָא קַיָם עִמְכוֹן יוֹמָא דֵין מְסָרְבִין הֲוֵיתוּן קֳדָם יְיָ וְאַף אֲרֵי בָּתַר דְאֵמוּת
verses.ar_en: For I know your rebelliousness your stubborness. Look! even while I live with you today you have been defiers [rebellious] with [before] Adonoy, surely after my death.

verses.ar_he: כְּנִישׁוּ לְוָתִי יָת כָּל סָבֵי שִׁבְטֵיכוֹן וְסָרְכֵיכוֹן וֶאֱמַלֵל קֳדָמֵיהוֹן יָת פִּתְגָמַיָא הָאִלֵין וְאַסְהֵד בְּהוֹן יָת שְׁמַיָא וְיָת אַרְעָא
verses.ar_en: Assemble to me all the judges of your tribes and your enforcers, and I will declare [before Me] in their hearing these statements, and invoke as witnesses against them heaven and earth,

verses.ar_he: אֲרֵי יְדַעְנָא בָּתַר דְאֵמוּת אֲרֵי חֲבָּלָא תְחַבְּלוּן וְתִסְטוּן מִן אָרְחָא דִי פַקֵדִית יָתְכוֹן וּתְעָרַע יָתְכוֹן בִּשְׁתָּא בְּסוֹף יוֹמַיָא אֲרֵי תַעְבְּדוּן יָת דְבִישׁ קֳדָם יְיָ לְאַרְגָזָא קֳדָמוֹהִי בְּעוֹבָדֵי יְדֵיכוֹן
verses.ar_en: For I know after my death, that you will become depraved and you will veer from the way that I commanded you; and harm will happen to you at the end of time, when you do what is wicked in [before] Adonoy’s eyes to spite [before] Him with your actions.

verses.ar_he: וּמַלִיל מֹשֶׁה קֳדָם כָּל קְהָלָא דְיִשְׂרָאֵל יָת פִּתְגָמֵי תּוּשְׁבַּחְתָּא הָדָא עַד דִשְׁלִימוּ
verses.ar_en: Moshe spoke in the hearing of [before] all the assemblage of Yisroel the statements of this song, till they were complete.

verses.ar_he: אַצִיתוּ שְׁמַיָא וֶאֱמַלֵל וְתִשְׁמַע אַרְעָא מֵימְרֵי פֻמִי
verses.ar_en: Hearken, O heaven as I declare, let the earth hear my mouth’s sayings.

verses.ar_he: יְבַסַם כְּמִטְרָא אוּלְפָּנִי יִתְקַבַּל כְּטַלָא מֵימְרִי כְּרוּחֵי מִטְרָא דְנָשְׁבִין עַל דִתְאָה וְכִרְסִיסֵי מַלְקוֹשָׁא דִי עַל עִשְׂבָּא
verses.ar_en: Let my instruction flow [be fragrant] like rainfall, let my saying drip [be accepted] like dew; like storm winds [blowing] on verdure, and like raindrops [the traces of the last rainfall] on grass.

verses.ar_he: אֲרֵי בִּשְׁמָא דַיְיָ אֲנָא מְצַלֵי הָבוּ רְבוּתָא קֳדָם אֱלָהָנָא
verses.ar_en: When I pronounce [pray in] the name of [before] Adonoy, give greatness to our God,

verses.ar_he: תַּקִיפָא דְשָׁלְמִין עוֹבָדוֹהִי אֲרֵי כָּל אֹרְחָתֵהּ דִינָא אֱלָהָא מְהֵימְנָא דְמִן קֳדָמוֹהִי עַוְלָה לָא נָפֵק מִן קֳדָם דְזַכַּי וְקַשִׁיט הוּא
verses.ar_en: The Almighty’s works are flawless [perfect], for all His ways are just; A God of faithfulness without [from before Him] injustice [does not eminate from before Him]; righteous and upright is He.

verses.ar_he: חַבִּילוּ לְהוֹן לָא לֵהּ בְּנַיָא דִי פְלָחוּ לְטַעֲוָתָא דָרָא דְאַשְׁנִיוּ עוֹבָדוֹהִי וְאִשְׁתַּנִיוּ
verses.ar_en: Destructiveness does not affect Him, it is the defect of His children [who prayed to idols]; a generation [that changed its activities and became changed] warped and twisted.

verses.ar_he: הָא קֳדָם יְיָ אַתּוּן גָמְלִין דָא עַמָא דְקַבִּילוּ אוֹרַיְתָא וְלָא חַכִּימוּ הֲלָא הוּא אֲבוּךְ וְאַתְּ דִי לֵהּ הוּא עָבְדָךְ וְאַתְקְנָךְ
verses.ar_en: Is it with [before] Adonoy that you deal this way? base people [who received the Torah and are] lacking wisdom. Is He not your Father, who made you His? He made you and gave you a base.

verses.ar_he: אִדְכַּר יוֹמִין דְמִן עָלְמָא אִסְתַּכַּל בִּשְׁנֵי דַר וְדַר שְׁאַל אֲבוּךְ וִיחַוִּי לָךְ סָבָיךְ וְיֵימְרוּן לָךְ
verses.ar_en: Remember world history, study the generational epochs. Ask your father and he will relate to you, your elders and they will tell you.

verses.ar_he: בְּאַחֲסָנָא עִלָאָה עַמְמַיָא בְּפָרָשׁוּתֵהּ בְּנֵי אֲנָשָׁא קַיִים תְּחוּמֵי עַמְמַיָא לְמִנְיַן בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל
verses.ar_en: When the Exalted One bequeathed nations, when He set apart the sons of man; He established the boundaries of peoples according to the number of Bnei Yisroel.

verses.ar_he: אֲרֵי חֳלָקָא דַיְיָ עַמֵהּ יַעֲקֹב עֲדַב אַחֲסַנְתֵּהּ
verses.ar_en: Because [of] Adonoy’s portion, His people, Yaakov the cable of His heritage.

verses.ar_he: סַפִּיק צָרְכֵּיהוֹן בְּאַרְעָא מַדְבְּרָא וּבֵית צַחֲוָנָא אֲתַר דִי לֵית מַיָא אַשְׁרִנוּן סְחוֹר סְחוֹר לִשְׁכִנְתֵּהּ אַלֵפִנוּן פִּתְגָמֵי אוֹרַיְתָא נְטָרִנוּן כְּבָבַת עֵינֵיהוֹן
verses.ar_en: He found them [satisfied their needs] in a wilderness country, in arid, shrieking desolation [a place where there was no water]. He encircled [placed them] them around [His Shechinah], He granted them understanding [He taught them Torah], He sheltered them like the pupil of His eye [their eyes].

verses.ar_he: כְּנִשְׁרָא דִמְחִישׁ לְקִנֵהּ עַל בְּנוֹהִי מִתְחוֹפֵף פָּרִיס גַדְפּוֹהִי מְקַבֶּלְהוֹן מְנַטֶלְהוֹן עַל תְּקוֹף אֵבָרוֹהִי
verses.ar_en: Like an eagle who rouses [protects] his nest, fluttering over his young, He extends His wings, grasps them, He bears them on His [strong] wing.

verses.ar_he: יְיָ בִּלְחוֹדוֹהִי עֲתִיד לְאַשְׁרָיוּתְהוֹן בְּעָלְמָא דְּהוּא עָתִיד לְאִתְחַדָתָא וְלָא יִתְקַיַם קֳדָמוֹהִי פָּלְחַן טַּעֲוָן
verses.ar_en: Adonoy conducted them alone, without [opposition by] alien gods. [Hashem alone will, in the future, place them in the world that He will renew and no idol worship will exist before Him.]

verses.ar_he: אַשְׁרִנוּן עַל תָּקְפֵּי אַרְעָא וְאוֹכָלִנוּן בִּזַת סָנְאֵיהוֹן וִיהַב לְהוֹן בִּזַת שַׁלִיטֵי קִרְוִין וְנִכְסֵי יָתְבֵי כְּרַכִּין תַּקִיפִין
verses.ar_en: He shall transport them over the summit of the earth where they will consume the produce of the fields; and He shall nurture them with honey of bedrock and oil of staunchest rock mass. [He placed them in the strong places of the land, and He fed them the spoils of their enemies, He gave them the spoils of the lords of cities, and the wealth of dwellers of fortified cities.]

verses.ar_he: יְהַב לְהוֹן בִּזַת מַלְכֵיהוֹן וְשַׁלִיטֵיהוֹן עִם עוֹתַר רַבְרְבֵיהוֹן וְתַקִפֵיהוֹן עַמָא דְאַרְעֲהוֹן וְאַחֲסַנְתְּהוֹן עִם בִּזַת חֵילֵיהוֹן וּמַשִׁרְיָתְהוֹן וְדַם גִבָּרֵיהוֹן יִתָּשַׁד כְּמַיָא
verses.ar_en: Butter-fat of cattle and milk of sheep with the fat of lambs, and rams native to Bashan and goats, with the fat of wheat kidneys, and the wine-flavored blood of the grapes will you drink. [He gave them the spoils of their kings and rulers with the wealth of their great and powerful, the people of their lands and their estates with the spoils of their armies and camps. The blood of their heroes was spilled like water.]

verses.ar_he: וְעַתַּר יִשְׂרָאֵל וּבְעַט אַצְלַח תְּקוֹף קְנָא נִכְסִין וּשְׁבַק פָּלְחַן אֱלָהָא דְעָבְדֵהּ וְאַרְגֵז קֳדָם תַּקִיפָא דְפָרְקֵהּ
verses.ar_en: Yeshurun grew fat and rebelled, you grew fat, you have become thick, and are covered with fat; he forsook the God who made him, he insulted the Rock of his salvation. [Yisroel grew fat and rebelled. He was very successful and wealthy and forsook the service of the God Who made him, and provoked the Almighty Who redeemed him.]

verses.ar_he: אַקְנִיאוּ קֳדָמוֹהִי בְּפָלְחַן טַעֲוָן בְּתוֹעֶבְתָּא אַרְגִיזוּ קֳדָמוֹהי
verses.ar_en: They incited His [before Him] vengeance with strangers [with idol worship], with loathsomeness did they spite Him [before Him].

verses.ar_he: דבָּחוּ לשֵׁדין דִלֵית בְּהוֹן צְרוֹךְ דַחֲלָן דְלָא יְדָעֻנוּן חַדְתִּין דִי מִקָרִיב אִתְעֲבִידוּ לָא אִתְעַסְקוּ בְהוֹן אֲבָהָתְכוֹן
verses.ar_en: They slaughtered to ineffectual demons, gods [that are worthless, fearful things that] they did not know; novelties, lately arrived—your forefathers were not awed by them [had no dealings with them].

verses.ar_he: דַחֲלַת תַקִיפָא דִבְרָאָךְ אִתְנְשֵׁתָא שְׁבַקְתָּא פָלְחַן אֱלָהָא דְעָבְדָךְ
verses.ar_en: [The fear of] the Rock Who bore you, you disregarded; you forsook [the service of] the Almighty Who delivered [made] you.

verses.ar_he: וּגְלֵי קֳדָם יְיָ וּתְקֵף רָגְזֵהּ מִדְאַרְגִיזוּ קֳדָמוֹהִי בְּנִין וּבְנָן
verses.ar_en: Adonoy saw and was angered, by the spite of His sons and His daughters. [It was apparent before Hashem, and His anger was kindled by the provocations of sons and daughters before Him.]

verses.ar_he: וַאֲמַר אֶסַלֵק שְׁכִנְתִּי מִנְהוֹן גְלֵי קֳדָמַי מָה יְהֵי בְסוֹפֵיהוֹן אֲרֵי דָרָא דְאַשְׁנִיוּ אִנוּן בְנַיָא דִלֵית בְּהוֹן הֵימָנוּ
verses.ar_en: He said, ‘‘I will hide [remove] My face [Shechinah] from them, I will see [it is revealed before Me] what their end will be; for they are an upsetting [deviated] generation, sons who are devoid of breeding [have no faith].

verses.ar_he: אִנוּן אַקְנִיאוּ קֳדָמַי בְּלָא דַחֲלָא אַרְגִיזוּ קֳדָמַי בְּפָלְחַן טַעֲוָן וַאֲנָא אַקְנִנוּן בְּלָא עַם בְּעַמָא טַּפְּשָׁא אַרְגֵזִנוּן
verses.ar_en: They have incited [before] Me [without fear] to vengeance with a non-god—have spited [before] Me with their [serving] idols; and I will incite them with a non-people, I shall anger them with a faithless [foolish] nation.

verses.ar_he: אֲרֵי קִדוּם תַּקִיף כְּאֶשָׁא נְפַק מִקָדָמַי בִּרְגַז וְשֵׁצֵי עַד שְׁאוֹל אֲרָעִית וְאָסֵף אַרְעָא וַעֲלַלְתַּהּ וְשֵׁצְיַת עַד סְיָפֵי טוּרַיָא
verses.ar_en: For a fire shall blaze in My anger, that will burn till the lowest grave; it shall consume the land and its produce, and enflame the bases of mountains. [For a wind as strong as fire has gone out from before Me in anger, which will destroy to the depths of the earth. It will annihilate the land and its produce, and destroy up to the edges of the mountains.]

verses.ar_he: אָסֵף עֲלֵיהוֹן בִּישִׁין מַכְתָּשַׁי אֱשֵׁצֵי בְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: I shall amass iniquity against them, I shall deplete my arrows [unleash My plagues] against them.

verses.ar_he: נְפִיחֵי כָפָן וַאֲכוּלֵי עוּף וּכְתִישֵׁי רוּחִין בִּישָׁן וְשֵׁן חֵיוַת בָּרָא אֱגָרֵי בְהוֹן עִם חֲמַת תַּנִינַיָא דְזָחֲלִין בְּעַפְרָא
verses.ar_en: Bloated with hunger, and embattled with demons and slashed by Meriri [plagues caused by evil winds]; and the teeth of animals will I send against them along with the venom of [serpents that are] dust-crawlers.

verses.ar_he: מִבָּרָא תְּתַכֵּל חַרְבָּא וּמִתְּוָנַיָא חַרְגַת מוֹתָא אַף עוּלֵמֵיהוֹן אַף עוּלֵמָתְהוֹן יָנְקֵיהוֹן עִם אֱנַשׁ סָבֵיהוֹן
verses.ar_en: From without, the sword shall decimate, and from within chambers, terror [the fear of death]; both lad and lass, suckling and aged man.

verses.ar_he: אֲמָרִית יֵחוֹל רוּגְזִי עֲלֵיהוֹן וֶאֱשֵׁצִנוּן אֱבַטַל מִבְּנֵי אֲנָשָׁא דוּכְרָנֵיהוֹן
verses.ar_en: I thought, ‘I shall abandon them,’ [My anger will fall upon them and I will destroy them], I would eliminate from mankind mention of them.

verses.ar_he: אִלוּלָפוֹן רָגְזָא דְסָנְאָה כְּנִישׁ דִילְמָא יִתְרַבְרַב בְּעֵל דְבָבָא דִילְמָא יֵימְרוּן יְדָנָא תְקִיפַת לָנָא וְלָא מִן קֳדָם יְיָ הֲוַת כָּל דָא
verses.ar_en: Were it not for the enemy’s amassed rage, lest their oppressors estrange [plot]; lest they say, ‘Our armed might has prevailed, and not [from before] Adonoy has performed all this.’

verses.ar_he: אֲרֵי עַם מְאַבְּדֵי עֵצָה אִנוּן וְלֵית בְּהוֹן סוּכְלְתָנוּ
verses.ar_en: For those nations squander counsel, they lack intelligence.

verses.ar_he: אִלוּ חַכִּימוּ אִסְתַּכָּלוּ בְדָא סְבָרוּ מָה יְהֵי בְסוֹפֵיהוֹן
verses.ar_en: Were they wise they would grasp this, they would contemplate [what will be] their ending.

verses.ar_he: אֶכְדֵין יִרְדוֹף חַד אַלְפָא וּתְרֵין יֶעֶרְקוּן לְרִבּוֹתָא אֶלָהֵן (אֲרֵי) תַּקִיפְהוֹן מְסָרִנוּן וַייָ אַשְׁלֵמִנוּן
verses.ar_en: How can one pursue a thousand, and two make ten thousand flee? Unless their Almighty [lit. rock] has dealt them away [handed them over], and Adonoy has delivered them?

verses.ar_he: אֲרֵי לָא כְתָקְפָּנָא תָּקְפְהוֹן וּבַעֲלֵי דְבָבָנָא הֲווֹ דַיָנָנָא
verses.ar_en: For their mighty one is not like our Almighty, yet our enemies sit in judgement [became our judges].

verses.ar_he: אֲרֵי כְפֻרְעֲנוּת עַמָא דִסְדוֹם פֻּרְעֲנוּתְהוֹן וְלָקוּתְהוֹן כְּעַם עֲמֹרָה מָחָתְהוֹן בִּישִׁין כְּרֵישֵׁי חֶוְיָן וְתֻשְׁלָמַת עוֹבָדֵיהוֹן כִּמְרָרוּתְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: For their grapevine is of the grapevine [as the calamity of the nation] of Sedom and from the fields [the calamity and deficiency as the nation] of Amorah; their grapes are grapes of bitter herbs. clusters galling to them. [You hit them as bad as the heads of serpentss, and the retribution for their deeds will be as bitter.]

verses.ar_he: הָא כְמָרַת תַּנִינַיָא כַּס פֻּרְעֲנוּתְהוֹן וּכְרֵישׁ פְּתָנֵי חֶוְיָן אַכְזְרָאִין
verses.ar_en: Like caustic [poison of] serpents’ venom is their wine [the cup of their calamity], and [like] the gall [heads] of adders, cruel.

verses.ar_he: הֲלָא כָל עוֹבָדֵיהוֹן גְלָן קֳדָמַי גְנִיזִין לְיוֹם דִינָא בְּאוֹצְרָי
verses.ar_en: Is this not sequestered with Me, sealed in My treasuries. [Are not all of their deeds revealed before Me, secreted away in my treasuries for the judgment day?]

verses.ar_he: קֳדָמַי פֻּרְעֲנוּתָא וַאֲנָא אֲשַׁלֵם לְעִדָן דְיִגְלוּן מֵאַרְעֲהוֹן אֲרֵי קָרִיב יוֹם תְּבָרְהוֹן וּמַבַּע דְעָתִיד לְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: Vengeance is [before] with Me, and I shall administer retribution at the time that they shall stumble [will be exiled from their land] for the day of their calamity [ruin] is close by, and destiny speeds towards them [and that which is prepared for them makes haste].

verses.ar_he: אֲרֵי יְדִין יְיָ דִינָא דְעַמֵהּ וּפֻרְעֲנוּת עֲבְדוֹהִי צַדִיקַיָא יִתְפְרַע אֲרֵי גְלֵי קֳדָמוֹהִי דִבְעִדָן דְתִתְקֵף עֲלֵיהוֹן מָחַת סָנְאָה יְהוֹן מִטַלְטְלִין וּשְׁבִיקִין
verses.ar_en: When Adonoy administers justice against His people and He will reconsider about His servants; when He sees the power surging, and none are structured or fortified. [When Hashem will decide the judgment of His people, and the cruelty to His just servants will be revenged; then it will be apparent before Him that when the clout of their enemies will grow stronger, they will be carried away and lost.]

verses.ar_he: וְיֵימַר אָן דַחֲלָתְהוֹן תַּקִיפָא דַהֲווֹ רְחִיצִין בֵּהּ
verses.ar_en: He shall say, ‘‘Where is their god [idol] the rock [mighty] on which they relied for shelter?

verses.ar_he: דִי תְרַב נִכְסָתְהוֹן הֲווֹ אָכְלִין שָׁתָן חֲמַר נִסְכֵּיהוֹן יְקוּמוּן כְּעַן וִיסַעֲדוּנְכוֹן יְהוֹן עֲלֵיכוֹן מָגֵן
verses.ar_en: They ate the fat of their sacrifices, they drank the wine of their libation? Let them arise and help you, let them serve as your shield.

verses.ar_he: חֲזוֹ כְּעַן אֲרֵי אֲנָא אֲנָא הוּא וְלֵית אֱלָהּ בַּר מִנִי אֲנָא מֵמִית וּמְחַיֵה מָחֵינָא וְאַף מַסֵינָא וְלֵית מִן יְדִי מְשֵׁזֵב
verses.ar_en: Now observe! For it is I! I am the One! and no god matches Me; I put to death and make live, I smite and I heal and no one can rescue from My grasp.

verses.ar_he: אֲרֵי אַתְקֵנִית בִּשְׁמַיָא בֵּית שְׁכִנְתִּי וַאֲמָרִית קַיָם אֲנָא לְעָלְמִין
verses.ar_en: For I shall lift My hand heavenward [I have prepared the heavens a place for My Shechinah], and I shall say, ‘I live forever.’

verses.ar_he: אִם עַל חַד תְּרֵין כְּחֵיזוּ בַרְקָא מִסוֹף שְׁמַיָא וְעַד סוֹף שְׁמַיָא תִּתְגְלִי חַרְבִּי וְתִתְקֵף בְּדִינָא יְדִי אָתֵב פֻּרְעֲנוּתָא לְסָנְאַי וּלְבַעֲלֵי דְבָבַי אֱשַׁלֵם
verses.ar_en: If I whet My saber to a gleam, and hold judgement in My grasp. I shall wreak vengeance on My foes and My spiters will I pay. [When My sword shall be revealed as a twofold lightning from one end of the heavens to the other, My hand will hold fast to judgment and I will visit calamity upon My enemies, and I will repay my adversaries.]

verses.ar_he: אֱרַוֵי גִירַי מִדְמָא וְחַרְבִּי תִּקְטוֹל בְּעַמְמַיָא מִדַם קְטִילָן וְשִׁבְיָן לְאַעְדָאָה כִתְרִין מֵרֵישׁ סָנְאָה וּבְעַל דְבָבָא
verses.ar_en: I shall make My arrows drunk with blood and My saber shall consume flesh [kill among the nations]; for the blood of the slaughtered and the captives, for the original savagery of the enemy [to remove the crowns from the heads of enemies and adversaries].’’

verses.ar_he: שַׁבָּחוּ עַמְמַיָא עַמֵהּ אֲרֵי פֻּרְעֲנוּת עַבְדוֹהִי צַדִיקַיָא יִתְפְּרַע וּפֻרְעֲנוּת יָתֵיב לְסָנְאוֹהִי וִיכַפֵּר עַל אַרְעֵהּ וְעַל עַמֵהּ
verses.ar_en: Let the nations extol His people for He shall avenge the blood [calamities] of His [just] servants and wreak vengeance [calamity] on His enemies and reconcile His land, His people.

verses.ar_he: וַאֲתָא מֹשֶׁה וּמַלִּיל יָת כָּל פִּתְגָמֵי תֻשְׁבַּחְתָּא הָדָא קֳדָם עַמָא הוּא וְהוֹשֵׁעַ בַּר נוּן
verses.ar_en: Moshe came and he spoke all the words of this song in the hearing of [before] the people; he and Hoshe’a, the son of Nun.

verses.ar_he: וְשֵׁצִי מֹשֶׁה לְמַלָלָא יָת כָּל פִּתְגָמַיָא הָאִלֵין עִם כָּל יִשְׂרָאֵל
verses.ar_en: When Moshe finished speaking all these words to all of Yisroel,

verses.ar_he: וַאֲמַר לְהוֹן שַׁווּ לִבְּכוֹן לְכָל פִּתְגָמַיָא דִי אֲנָא מַסְהֵד בְּכוֹן יוֹמָא דֵין דִי תְפַקְדִנוּן יָת בְּנֵיכוֹן לְמִטַר לְמֶעְבַּד יָת כָּל פִּתְגָמֵי אוֹרַיְתָא הָדָא
verses.ar_en: He said to them, ‘‘Focus your thoughts on all the statements that I am bringing to witness against you today; which you are to command to your sons to guard and to fulfill all the statements of this Torah.

verses.ar_he: אֲרֵי לָא פִתְגָם רֵקָא הוּא מִנְכוֹן אֲרֵי הוּא חַיֵיכוֹן וּבְפִתְגָמָא הָדֵין תּוֹרְכוּן יוֹמִין עַל אַרְעָא דִי אַתּוּן עָבְרִין יָת יַרְדְנָא תַּמָן לְמֵירְתַהּ
verses.ar_en: For it is not a futile thing for you, for it is your life; and by this matter will you live long on the land that you are crossing the Yardein there to inherit.’’

verses.ar_he: וּמַלִיל יְיָ עִם מֹשֶׁה בִּכְרַן יוֹמָא הָדֵין לְמֵימָר
verses.ar_en: Adonoy spoke to Moshe at the very height of that day, saying,

verses.ar_he: סַק לְטוּרָא דַעֲבָרָאֵי הָדֵין טוּרָא דִנְבוֹ דִי בְּאַרְעָא דְמוֹאָב דִי עַל אַפֵּי יְרֵחוֹ וַחֲזֵי יָת אַרְעָא דִכְנַעַן דִי אֲנָא יָהֵב לִבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל לְאַחֲסָנָא
verses.ar_en: ‘‘Go up to this Mount Ho’avorim, Mount Nevo, which is in the land of Moav, that faces Yereicho; and see the land of Canaan that I am giving to Bnei Yisroel as inheritance.

verses.ar_he: וּמוּת בְּטוּרָא דִי אַתְּ סָלֵק לְתַמָן וְתִתְכְּנֵשׁ לְעַמָךְ כְּמָא דְמִית אַהֲרֹן אֲחוּךְ בְּהוֹר טוּרָא וְאִתְכְּנִישׁ לְעַמֵהּ
verses.ar_en: And die on the mountain upon which you are going up and be gathered unto your people, just as your brother Aharon died in Hor Hohor and was gathered unto his people.

verses.ar_he: עַל דִי שַׁקַרְתּוּן בְּמֵימְרִי בְּגוֹ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל בְּמֵי מַצוּת רְקָם מַדְבְּרָא דְצִין עַל דִי לָא קַדִשְׁתּוּן יָתִי בְּגוֹ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל
verses.ar_en: Because you were unfaithful [untrue] to Me [My word] amid Bnei Yisroel at the waters of argument at Kodeish [Rekom] in the Tzin wilderness; because of [the fact] that you did not sanctify Me amid Bnei Yisroel.

verses.ar_he: אֲרֵי מִקֳבֵל תֶּחֱזֵי יָת אַרְעָא וּלְתַמָן לָא תֵעוּל לְאַרְעָא דִי אֲנָא יָהֵב לִבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל
verses.ar_en: For from afar will you see the land but you will not come there to the land that I am giving to Bnei Yisroel.’’

verses.ar_he: וְדָא בִרְכְּתָא דִי בְרִיךְ מֹשֶׁה נְבִיָא דַיְיָ יָת בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל קֳדָם מוֹתֵהּ
verses.ar_en: And this is the blessing that Moshe, the man [prophet] of God, blessed Bnei Yisroel before his death.

verses.ar_he: וַאֲמַר יְיָ מִסִינַי אִתְגְלִי וְזֵהוֹר יְקָרֵהּ מִשֵׂעִיר אִתְחֲזֵי לָנָא אִתְגְלִי בִגְבֻרְתֵּהּ מִטוּרָא דְפָארָן וְעִמֵהּ רִבְבַת קַדִישִׁין כְּתַב יַמִינֵהּ מִגוֹ אֶשָׁתָא אוֹרַיְתָא יְהַב לָנָא
verses.ar_en: He said: ‘‘Adonoy came [was revealed] from Sinai, [His glory] radiated forth to them from Seir, appeared [to us in His might] from Mount Paran He came with part of the sacred myriads; from [the writing of] His right [hand]—[from the midst of] the flaming [flame He gave the] Torah law [to us].

verses.ar_he: אַף חַבִּיבִנוּן לְשִׁבְטַיָא כָּל קַדִישׁוֹהִי בֵית יִשְׁרָאֵל בִּגְבוּרָא אַפֵּקִנוּן מִמִצְרָיִם וְאִנוּן מִדַבְּרִין תִּחוֹת עֲנָנָךְ נָטִלִין עַל מֵימְרָךְ
verses.ar_en: He also cherished the nations—all of their sacred ones are in Your keeping; for they were gathered in at Your feet and accepted the burden of Your word. [He even loved the tribes, the holy ones of the house of Israel, He mightily led them out of Egypt, and they are conducted under the "“cloud,” led by Your word.]

verses.ar_he: אוֹרַיְתָא יְהַב לָנָא מֹשֶׁה מְסָרַהּ יְרֻתָּא לְכִנְשַׁת יַעֲקֹב
verses.ar_en: The Torah which Moshe commanded [gave] us, is the [transmitted as a] heritage of the congregation of Yaakov.

verses.ar_he: וַהֲוָה בְיִשְׂרָאֵל מַלְכָּא בְּאִתְכַּנָשׁוּת רֵישֵׁי עַמָא כַּחֲדָא שִׁבְטַיָא דְיִשְׂרָאֵל
verses.ar_en: There was a king in Yeshurun [Yisroel], at the gathering of the counting. the tribes of Yisroel together.

verses.ar_he: יְחִי רְאוּבֵן לְחַיֵי עַלְמָא וּמוֹתָא תִנְיָנָא לָא יְמוּת וִיקַבְּלוּן בְּנוֹהִי אַחֲסַנְתְּהוֹן בְּמִנְיָנְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: May Reuvein live and let him not die, and may his constituency be counted. [May Reuvein live forever, and a second death he shall not die. His children will receive their inheritance according to their numbers.]

verses.ar_he: וְדָא לִיהוּדָה וַאֲמַר קַבֵּל יְיָ צְלוֹתֵהּ דִיהוּדָא בְּמִפְּקֵהּ לְאַגָחָא קְרָבָא וּלְעַמֵהּ תָּתֵיבִנֵהּ לִשְׁלָם יְדוֹהִי יַעְבְּדָן לֵהּ פֻּרְעֲנוּתָא מִסָנְאוֹהִי וְסָעִיד מִבַּעֲלֵי דְבָבוֹהִי הֲוֵי לֵהּ
verses.ar_en: Now this for Yehudah and he said, ‘‘Adonoy, hear the voice of Yehudah, and bring him to his people; May his hands fight his battles and may You provide assistance against his enemies.’’ [And this is for Yehudah, and he said: Accept, Hashem, the prayers of Yehudah when he goes out to wage war, and return his nation in peace. Let his hand bring calamity upon his enemies, and be for him a help against his enemies.]

verses.ar_he: וּלְלֵוִי אֲמַר תּוּמַיָא וְאוּרַיָא אַלְבֶּשְׁתָּא לִגְבַר דְאִשְׁתְּכַח חֲסִידָא קֳדָמָךְ דִי נַסִיתוֹהִי בְּנִסֵתָא וַהֲוָה שְׁלִים בְּחַנְתּוֹהִי עַל מֵי מַצוּתָא וְאִשְׁתְּכַח מְהֵימָן
verses.ar_en: And regarding Levi he said, ‘‘Your tumim and Your urim [You have clothed] to Your pious man [the man who was found to be pious before You]; whom You tried with tests [and was found whole (worthy)], You brought him strife at the waters of Merivah [and was found faithful].

verses.ar_he: דְעַל אֲבוֹהִי וְעַל אִמֵהּ לָא רַחֵם כַּד חָבוּ מִן דִינָא וְאַפֵּי אֲחוֹהִי וּבְנוֹהִי לָא נְסִיב אֲרֵי נְטָרוּ מַטְרַת מֵימְרָךְ וּקְיָמָךְ לָא אַשְׁנִיוּ
verses.ar_en: He who said of his father and his mother, ‘I did not see them,‘ and his brothers he did not recognize and his sons he did not know; for they observed Your command and kept Your covenant. [On his father and his mother he showed no mercy if they were (found) guilty by law, nor did he "“recognize” his brothers or children, for they guarded the charge of Your word and did not alter Your covenant.]

verses.ar_he: כָּשְׁרִין אִלֵין דְיַלְפוּן דִינָיךְ לְיַעֲקֹב וְאוֹרַיְתָךְ לְיִשְׂרָאֵל יְשַׁוּוּן קְטוֹרֶת בּוּסְמִין קֳדָמָךְ וּגְמִיר לְרַעֲוָא עַל מַדְבְּחָךְ
verses.ar_en: They shall [are worthy to] teach Your law to Yaakov and Your Torah to Yisroel; let them place [fragrant] incense before You and totally consumed offerings on Your altar [willingly];

verses.ar_he: בָּרֵךְ יְיָ נִכְסוֹהִי וְקוּרְבַּן יְדוֹהִי תְּקַבֵּל בְּרַעֲוָא תְּבַר חַרְצָא דְסָנְאוֹהִי וּדְבֵעֲלֵי דְבָבוֹהִי דְלָא יְקוּמוּן
verses.ar_en: Adonoy, bless his wealth and accept his handiwork [the offerings of his hand accept willingly]; shatter his adversaries at the loins and his enemies, so that they may not arise.’’

verses.ar_he: לְבִנְיָמִן אֲמַר רְחִימָא דַיְיָ יִשְׁרֵי לְרָחְצַן עֲלוֹהִי יְהֵי מָגֵן עֲלוֹהִי כָּל יוֹמַיָא וּבְאַרְעֵהּ תִּשְׁרֵי שְׁכִנְתָּא
verses.ar_en: Regarding Binyomin he said, ‘‘Adonoy’s friend, let him live secure with Him; He hovers protectively [a shield] over him throughout the day, and He resides between his shoulders [and in his land the Shechinah will dwell].’’

verses.ar_he: וּלְיוֹסֵף אֲמַר מְבָרָכָא מִן קֳדָם יְיָ אַרְעֵהּ עָבְדָא מִגְדָנִין מִטַלָא דִשְׁמַיָא מִלְעֵלָא וּמִמַבּוּעֵי עֵינָוָן וּתְהוֹמִין דְנָגְדָן מִמַעֲמַקֵי אַרְעָא מִלְרָע
verses.ar_en: And regarding Yoseif he said, ‘‘Blessed by [before] Adonoy is his land; with the [producing the] delight of heaven, from dew, and the [wellsprings and] deep waters that lie [flow from the depths of the earth] below.

verses.ar_he: וְעָבְדָא מִגְדָנִין וַעֲלָלָן מִיבוּל שִׁמְשָׁא וְעָבְדָא מִגְדָנִין מֵרֵישׁ יְרַח בִּירַח
verses.ar_en: With [it produces] the delight[s] of the sun’s harvest; and with the delight of the moon’s ripening [from month to month].

verses.ar_he: וּמֵרֵיש טוּרַיָא בַכִּירַיָא וּמִטוּב רָמָן דְלָא פָסְקָן
verses.ar_en: With the first fruits of the early mountains [tops] and from the sweetness of the perennial hills.

verses.ar_he: וּמִטוּב אַרְעָא וּמָלָאַהּ וְרָעֵי לֵהּ דִשְׁכִנְתֵּהּ בִּשְׁמַיָא וְעַל מֹשֶׁה אִתְגְלִי בַאֲסָנָא יֵיתוּן כָּל אִלֵין לְרֵישָׁא דְיוֹסֵף וּלְגַבְרָא פָּרִישָׁא דַאֲחוֹהִי
verses.ar_en: And from the sweetness [best] of earth and its fullness, and the favor of the One [Shechinah] who resides in [heavens and appeared to Moshe in] the thornbush; let [all of] this be visited upon Yoseif’s head, and upon the head of the one [man] set apart from his brothers.

verses.ar_he: רַבָּא דִבְנוֹהִי זִיוָא לֵהּ וּגְבוּרָן דְאִתְעֲבִידָא לֵהּ מִקֳדָם דְתוּקְפָא וְרוּמָא דִילֵהּ בִּגְבֻרְתֵּהּ עַמְמַיָא יִקְטֵל כַּחֲדָא עַד סְיָפֵי אַרְעָא וְאִנוּן רִבְוָתָא דְבֵית אֶפְרַיִם וְאִנוּן אַלְפַיָא דְבֵית מְנַשֶׁה
verses.ar_en: His firstborn ox, glory to him, and re’em’s horns are his horns, with which he will gore together peoples to the ends of the earth; and they are Ephraim’s myriads, and they are Menasheh’s thousands.’’ [The greatness of his children will be his beauty, and the mighty things [miracles] done for him from before the Almighty and Most High, with his might he will slay nations as one to the ends of the earth. They are the myriads of the house of Ephraim and they are the thousands of the house of Menasheh.]

verses.ar_he: וְלִזְבוּלֻן אֲמַר חֲדֵי זְבוּלֻן בְּמִפְּקָךְ לַאֲגָחָא קְרָבָא עַל בַּעֲלֵי דְבָבָךְ וְיִשָׂשׂכָר בִּמְהָכָךְ לְמֶעְבַּד זִמְנֵי מוֹעֲדַיָא בִּירוּשְׁלֵם
verses.ar_en: And regarding Zevulun he said, ‘‘Rejoice Zevulun at your departure; and Yissachar in your tents [Rejoice Zevulun when you go out to wage war on your enemies, and Yissachar when you go to calculate the times of the Festivals in Yerushalayim.].

verses.ar_he: שִׁבְטַּיָא דְיִשְׂרָאֵל לְטוּר בֵּית מַקְדְשָׁא יִתְכַּנְשׁוּן תַּמָן יִכְסוּן נִכְסַת קוּדְשִׁין לְרַעֲוָא אֲרֵי נִכְסֵי עַמְמַיָא יֵיכְלוּן וְסִימָא דְמִטַמְרָא בְחָלָא מִתְגַלְיָא לְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: Peoples [tribes of Israel] shall assemble at the mountain [of the Beis Hamikdosh]—there will they slaughter righteous [sacred] offerings [for good will]; for by the streaming of the sea they shall be nurtured [they will consume the wealth of nations] and the hidden treasures of sand [will be revealed to them].’’

verses.ar_he: וּלְגָד אֲמַר בְּרִיךְ דְאַפְתֵּי לְגָד כְּלֵיתָא שָׁרֵי וְיִקְטוֹל שִׁלְטוֹנִין עִם מַלְכִין
verses.ar_en: And regarding Gad he said, ‘‘Blessed is the One who broadens [increases] Gad; He lairs like a lion then rips the arm with the head [and he will kill rulers and kings].

verses.ar_he: וְאִתְקַבֵּל בְּקַדְמֵתָא דִילֵהּ אֲרֵי תַמָן בְּאַחֲסַנְתֵּהּ מֹשֶׁה סָפְרָא רַבָּא דְיִשְׂרָאֵל קְבִיר וְהוּא נָפֵק וְעַל בְּרֵישׁ עַמָא זַכְוָן קֳדָם יְיָ עֲבַד וְדִינוֹהִי עִם יִשְׂרָאֵל
verses.ar_en: He saw the foremost for himself, [he received (his portion of land) first,] for there [in his inheritance, is Moshe] the great scribe’s burial plot is concealed; he marched [and rose] at the head of the people, he acted righteously [with merit] before Adonoy and His laws with Yisroel.’’

verses.ar_he: וּלְדָן אֲמַר דָן תַּקִיף כְּגוּר אַרְיְוָן אַרְעֵהּ שָׁתְיָא מִן נַחֲלַיָא דְנָגְדָן מִן מַתְנָן
verses.ar_en: And regarding Don he said, ‘‘Don is [mighty as] a lion cub, bounding from Bashan [his territory is watered by the streams that flow from Masnon].’’

verses.ar_he: וּלְנַפְתָּלִי אֲמַר נַפְתָּלִי שְׂבַע רַעֲוָא וּמְלֵי בִּרְכָן מִן קֳדָם יְיָ מַעֲרָב יָם גִנוֹסַר וְדָרוֹמָא יֵרָת
verses.ar_en: And regarding Naftoli he said, ‘‘Naftoli’s desire is satisfied and he is full of blessing [from before] Adonoy; occupy the sea [west of the Sea of Ginosar] and its southern coast!’’

verses.ar_he: וּלְאָשֵׁר אֲמַר בְּרִיךְ מִבִּרְכַּת בְּנַיָא אָשֵׁר יְהֵי רַעֲוָא לְאַחוֹהִי וְיִתְרַבֵּי בְּתַפְנוּקֵי מַלְכִין
verses.ar_en: And regarding Asher he said, ‘‘May Asher be blessed with [the blessing of] sons; he shall be favored by his brothers and immerse his foot in oil [and be nourished with the delicacies of kings].’’

verses.ar_he: תַּקִיף כְּפַרְזְלָא וּנְחָשָׁא מוֹתָבָךְ וּכְיוֹמֵי עוּלֵמָתָךְ תָּקְפָּךְ
verses.ar_en: Your locks are [mighty as] iron and copper; As the days [of your youth], so may be your declining days [your might].

verses.ar_he: לֵית אֱלָהּ כֶּאֱלָהָא דְיִשְׂרָאֵל דִשְׁכִנְתֵּהּ בִּשְׁמַיָא בְּסַעְדָךְ וְתָקְפֵּהּ בִּשְׁמֵי שְׁמַיָא
verses.ar_en: [There is no] God is incomparable—Yeshurun [as the God of Yisrael Whose Shechinah in the heaven is your help]; He who straddles the firmament in your aid and, in His pride, [might is in] the high heavens.

verses.ar_he: מְדוֹר אֱלָהָא דִי מִלְקַדְמִין בְּמֵימְרֵהּ אִתְעֲבֵד עָלְמָא וְתָרִיךְ מִקֳדָמָךְ סָנְאָה וַאֲמַר שֵׁצִי
verses.ar_en: As the dwelling of the eternal God [Whose word originally created the world], and beneath are the world’s strong-armed; He banished the enemy from your presence and said, ‘Destroy.’

verses.ar_he: וּשְׁרָא יִשְׂרָאֵל לְרָחְצָן בִּלְחוֹדוֹהִי כְּעֵין בִּרְכְּתָא דְבָרֵכִנוּן יַעֲקֹב אֲבוּהוֹן לְאַרְעָא עָבְדָא עִבוּר וַחֲמָר אַף שְׁמַיָא דְעִלָוֵיהוֹן יְשַׁ מְשֻׁנוּן בְּטַלָא
verses.ar_en: Yisroel lived securely, as individuals like [the blessing that] Yaakov [your forefather blessed] in a land of [producing] grain and wine; even its skies [above them] shall drip dew.

verses.ar_he: טוּבָּךְ יִשְׂרָאֵל לֵית דִכְוָתָךְ עַמָא דְפֻרְקָנֵהּ מִן קֳדָם יְיָ תַּקִיף בְּסַעְדָךְ וּדְמִן קֳדָמוֹהִי נִצְחָן גִבַּרְוָתָךְ וִיכַדְבוּן סָנְאָךְ לָךְ וְאַתְּ עַל פְּרִיקַת צַוָארֵי מַלְכֵיהוֹן תִּדְרֹךְ
verses.ar_en: You are fortunate, Yisroel, who can compare to you—a people saved by [from before] Adonoy, the shield [might] of your aid and who [provides the victory of] the sword of your glory [from before Him comes the victory of your powerful]; and your enemies will prevaricate to you, while you tread on their high places [the necks of their kings].’’

verses.ar_he: וּסְלֵיק מֹשֶׁה מִמֵישְׁרָא דְמוֹאָב לְטוּרָא דִנְבוֹ רֵישׁ רָמָתָא דִי עַל אַפֵּי יְרֵחוֹ וְאַחְזְיֵהּ יְיָ יָת כָּל אַרְעָא יָת גִלְעָד עַד דָן
verses.ar_en: Moshe went up from the plains of Moav to Mount Nevo—the peak of the crest that faces Yereicho; and Adonoy showed him the entire land, the Gil’od till Don.

verses.ar_he: וְיָת כָּל נַפְתָּלִי וְיָת אַרְעָא דְאֶפְרַיִם וּמְנַשֶׁה וְיָת כָּל אַרְעָא דִיהוּדָה עַד יַמָא מַעַרְבָא
verses.ar_en: And all of Naftoli, and the land of Ephraim and Menasheh; and all the land of Yehudah up until the rearward [westward] Sea.

verses.ar_he: וְיָת דָרוֹמָא וְיָת מֵישְׁרָא בִּקְעֲתָא דִירֵחוֹ קַרְתָּא דְדִקְלַיָא עַד צוֹעַר
verses.ar_en: And the Negev, and the plain, the valley of Yereicho, the city of date-palms, till Tzo’ar.

verses.ar_he: וַאֲמַר יְיָ לֵהּ דָא אַרְעָא דִי קַיֵמִית לְאַבְרָהָם לְיִצְחָק וּלְיַעֲקֹב לְמֵימָר לִבְנָיךְ אֶתְּנִנַהּ אַחֲזִיתָךְ בְּעֵינָיךְ וּלְתַמָן לָא תְעִבַּר
verses.ar_en: Adonoy said to him, ‘‘This is the land that I swore to Avrohom, to Yitzchok, and to Yaakov, saying, ‘I will give it to your descendants [children]’; I have shown it to you with your eyes, but you will not cross over there.’’

verses.ar_he: וּמִית תַּמָן מֹשֶׁה עַבְדָא דַיְיָ בְּאַרְעָא דְמוֹאָב עַל מֵימְרָא דַיְיָ
verses.ar_en: Moshe, Adonoy’s servant, died there, in the land of Moav, by the mouth [word] of Adonoy.

verses.ar_he: וּקְבַר יָתֵהּ בְּחֵילָתָא בְּאַרְעָא דְמוֹאָב לְקֳבֵל בֵּית פְּעוֹר וְלָא יְדַע אֱנַשׁ יָת קְבֻרְתֵּה עַד יוֹמָא הָדֵין
verses.ar_en: He buried him in the valley in the land of Moav facing Beis Peor; and no man knows his burial place till this very day.

verses.ar_he: וּמֹשֶׁה בַּר מְאָה וְעַשְׂרִין שְׁנִין כַּד מִית לָא כְהַת עֵינוֹהִי וְלָא שְׁנָא זִיו יְקָרָא דְאַפּוֹהִי
verses.ar_en: And Moshe was 120 years old at his death; his appearance was not dulled, and his freshness did not fade [his facial radiance did not change].

verses.ar_he: וּבְכוֹ בְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל יָת מֹשֶׁה בְּמֵישְׁרַיָא דְמוֹאָב תְּלָתִין יוֹמִין וּשְׁלִימוּ יוֹמֵי בָכִיתָא אֶבְלָא דְמֹשֶׁה
verses.ar_en: Bnei Yisroel bewailed Moshe on the plains of Moav for thirty days; [after which] ended the days of bewailing in Moshe’s mourning period.

verses.ar_he: וִיהוֹשֻׁעַ בַּר נוּן מְלֵי רוּחַ חָכְמְתָא אֲרֵי סְמַךְ מֹשֶׁה יָת יְדוֹהִי עֲלוֹהִי וְקַבִּילוּ מִנֵהּ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וַעֲבָדוּ כְּמָא דִי פַּקִיד יְיָ יָת מֹשֶׁה
verses.ar_en: And Yehoshua son of Nun was filled with a spirit of wisdom because Moshe had rested his hands on him; Bnei Yisroel listened to him and acted as Adonoy had commanded Moshe.

verses.ar_he: וְלָא קָם נְבִיָא עוֹד בְּיִשְׂרָאֵל כְּמֹשֶׁה דִי אִתְגְלִי לֵהּ יְיָ אַפִּין בְּאַפִּין
verses.ar_en: And there has not ever arisen a prophet within Yisroel like Moshe, whom Adonoy knew [appeared to] face-to-face.

verses.ar_he: לְכָל אָתַיָא וּמוֹפְתַיָא דִי שָׁלְחֵהּ יְיָ לְמֶעְבַּד בְּאַרְעָא דְמִצְרָיִם לְפַרְעֹה וּלְכָל עַבְדוֹהִי וּלְכָל אַרְעֵהּ
verses.ar_en: For all the signs and the wonders that Adonoy sent him to perform in the land of Egypt, to Pharoah and to all his slaves and to his entire land.

verses.ar_he: וּלְכֹל יְדָא תַקֶפְתָּא וּלְכֹל חֵזְוָנָא רַבָּא דִי עֲבַד מֹשֶׁה לְעֵינֵי כָּל יִשְׂרָאֵל
verses.ar_en: And for the entire strong hand and for the entire great display [manifestations] that Moshe performed in view of all of Yisroel. CHAZAK
